subject: Supplementary Agreement for 100% Change of Shareholding & Refinancing in Respect of PPP Projects
text: IRdy 7754 WTHNfqiferarrut (1eq 9dev &k TrTHNf TnT4, #Ra TOR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #4 74 011-5 vai 6, #az7-10, &RT; 7f fovlf 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ PPP /2023 Policy Circular No. 8.4.40/ 2023 dated 27th April, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/BOT /SUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT/2022 (Comp. No. 184125)} Corrigendum Sub: Supplementary agreement for 100% change of shareholding & refinancing in respect of PPP Projects reg: Reference Policy Guideline No.8.4.38, dated 13.02.2023 on the above mentioned subject: The word "transfer of any benefitsownership" in Para 3.1 of Annexure -| of said circular may please read as "transfer of beneficial ownership" 2 _ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
